name: espocrm-docker
description: This project involves running EspoCRM locally using Docker and performing extensive automated testing using Playwright with TypeScript.

scripts.bdd: npx rimraf allure-results && bddgen && (playwright test || true) && node scripts/generate-allure-metadata.js && npm run report
scripts.report: allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && node scripts/customize-theme.js && allure open allure-report
